Package me.mayhem.util.ui.impl

Class TextAreaInteractable

java.lang.Object
me.mayhem.input.InputListener<org.jsfml.window.event.KeyEvent>
me.mayhem.util.ui.AbstractKeyboardMouseInteractable
me.mayhem.util.ui.impl.TextAreaInteractable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Interactable
Direct Known Subclasses:
InputBox
public abstract class TextAreaInteractable
extends AbstractKeyboardMouseInteractable
An abstract implementation of the Interactable interface and the AbstractKeyboardMouseInteractable that checks if the area has been clicked before updating the written text on the screen.

  • Field Summary
